docs.lead_paragraph: AFTER seven years operating out of Diane Casper's bedroom, the Young/Casper agency has moved into commercial space at 136 East 57th Street. And now that she has the unusual overhead of rent ($27 a square foot), Mrs. Casper, the president, has engaged in a concentrated push for new business, one facet of which is a bit of a public relations program. Lending a hand in this area is Corinne Shane, a public relations professional and a neighbor of Mrs. Casper up at 85th Street. Together the two women have come up with the catchy designation ''Disease Lady of Madison Avenue.''
